resources.string:
1. Place cup.
2. Wait for stable reading.
3. Refill with the cup on the scale.
4. After drinking, put the cup back on the scale.
5. Enjoy!

• This app logs intake/refill.
• The Remind button sends a reminder to the scale, displayed as an LED effect.
• Entries can be exported as a CSV file.
• Backups are automatically saved in the Download folder.
